It does work. Something I have noticed while using various bittorrent clients is that sometimes they will misreport having the entire file downloaded. If you run into a crc error while unpacking or an installation error it could mean that you don't possess the whole thing. I haven't used bitcomet in a while but in uTorrent once the file is done stop uploading then right click and force recheck then go back to uploading. I've seen it say 100% done a recheck and have it drop to 98%. If bitcomet azaerus etc. has such a feature can someone add that kind of information.

To install this on Win. Vista

Step 1:
I had to extarct the whole iso to HD and the right-click the setup and choose run as admin.
(Do this if mounting it on Daemon doesn't work)

Step 2:
Once installed past the crack where the origenal exe is then right-clicked it and changed compatabilty to Win. XP (not sure you have to do this Step but it doesn't hurt either)

Step 3:
Right-clicked the Crack again and choose run as admin. Doing this enable you to save your games.

Hopefully this helps you :)

En enkel resumé av hittintills uppkommna problem och dess lösningar.


1. Ladda ner filen/erna
2. Packa upp filerna genom att packa upp den första i listan.
3. Mounta .img filen som du fått efter upppakningen.
4. Öppna skivan genom mountningen. Klicka igång installationen genom setup.exe.
5. Efter fullföljd installation, kopiera Jade empire filen från ViTALiTY mappen på "skivan". Klistra in denna i mappen där du installerat spelet.

Anyways, I've got a problem besides a zero installation and not being able to unpack.

It's where the setup aborts the installation of certain files required to run the game like any executable files or dlls.

It took some figuring out to but instead of using the setup, just manually unpack all of the .rar files in the data subfile in the image to the installation folder and it will be like a full installation.

This can solve the zero kb problem and the one I just mentioned.

After that just crack and run.

If your system specs can't handle the game, try 3D-Analyze, it changes the settings of the game that it's normal configuration settings won't allow you to do, so you can hope to run it, just google it.

After setting it up, select the crack in the installation folder, and check Force SW TnL in the Performance category, and press run.

To increase frame rates, adjust the config in the game to disable Bloom, Soft Shadows, etc.

Happy Playing!
Never complain about free beer.

Oh yes, and you can also disable vertex compression if you experience some funk.

Open JadeEmpire.ini file in a text editor.  Under the [Render] section will be a line that says:

VertexOpt=1

Change the 1 to a 0 (zero) to disable vertex compression and try running the game again.

I can confirm that THIS TORRENT WORKS. Here's what I did to the best of my knowledge. Make sure you have an ISO file reader. And see last comments at the end of instructions. 


1.Download Torrent(no shit)

2. Klick on Torrent, in your preferred Torrent-Downloader, and see if you can open kontaining folder which holds all the files inside.(Torrent should say Jade.Empire.Special.Edition-ViTALiTY) 

3*.This may be the most potentially confusing step...when you open file folder you should see lots of files named vty-jese and vty-jese.r(x) (x will be a number i.e. vty-jese.r30). Click on ANY VTY-JESE .RAR (the ones that say WinRar and what lookz like kolored books) FILE NOT VTY-JESE.R(X), leave those alone. 

4. When you klick on a vty-jese winRar file, it should open up another window with the selected file, then you should see an vty-jese iso file (Well i have Magic Iso so it looks like a small disk). klick on it and extract it to wherever yonder i dont think it matters. I extracted mine to the deskTop.

5.When you see where you extracted it right click on it and you should see an option that says open folder. When you do click on the file that says setup make sure you do because THE AUTO-RUN INSTALL DOESN'T WORK. 

6. Wait awhile till its finished then go here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3628918/Jade.Empire.Special.Edition.CRACK.ONLY-ViTALiTY. And download torrent from there

7. Once new torrent is done kinda follow steps 3 & 4 which is to extract the crack and replace old (or should i say recently downloaded??) jade empire.exe. (Located wherever you extracted it to Program Files, Desktop, etc.).

8. Click on newly cracked jade empire.exe then play
